column5: the title pretty much says it all.. Im interested in trying some of theese tho I am the type that doesnt like ordering/shipping  somthing like these.. http://www.bayououtdoors.com/products.php?cat=55
bass pro would most likley carry those.
hmm I have only looked once with no luck. but i wouldnt doubt it if they did
im going today, i'll let you know.
bps does not carry them. Gagnons in Shwa carries a punch jig. Its just the head and skirt. You slide your line through and add your choice of hook and trailer. 6.99 tho
I have a few plastic beads and spare skirts. I was just going to take a dremel to a plastic bead to carve out a groove for the skirt. I wanted to buy them but the price

catch 'em bait and tackle down in the south end of kitchener has them.  you can buy just one or a handful, they're not pre-packaged.  I haven't been in there since they resized the store but I doubt they would change their inventory too much.   you should call first to be sure.
You can find the real Punch Skirts at Fishing World in Hamilton, I was just there and pickings are getting slim, with a couple colors already sold out.
LOL! love the names on those!
Sweaty Betty has to be my fav!

lol "gas money"  anyways no luck at bass pro.. none of those guys knew what i was talking about.. i asked them if anyone could get a job there and left.. lol at one point i asked to be pointed towards someone who could tell me and they pointed to some guy who barley knew to speak english.

I just picked mine up at Fishingworld in Hamilton. Sorry, I may have bought to many. They also have the Paycheck hooks to match . Cant wait for next weekend. I usually find all that hard to find stuff there as Blake brings it in all the time. This is gonna be a good year for Mats.  They also have the Basstrix swimbaits and the Buckeye Mop Jigs but they wont be there long. I'm going out again this week.
haha thanks guys, I deal alot with gagnouns so i'll go check them out on an upcoming day! if not I guess I'll just get one of my connections to order me some along with those Ish's phat frogs
